weka.core.tokenizers

Class TweetNLPTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.core.tokenizers.Tokenizer
      • weka.core.tokenizers.TweetNLPTokenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Enumeration<java.lang.String>, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler

    public class TweetNLPTokenizer
extends Tokenizer
    A Twitter-specific tokenizer based on the CMU TwitterNLP library: http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~ark/TweetNLP/ BibTeX: 
     @InProceedings{twitterNLP,
        Title                    = {Part-of-speech tagging for twitter: Annotation, features, and experiments},
        Author                   = {Gimpel, Kevin and Schneider, Nathan and O'Connor, Brendan and Das, Dipanjan and Mills, Daniel and Eisenstein, Jacob and Heilman, Michael and Yogatama, Dani and Flanigan, Jeffrey and Smith, Noah A},
        Booktitle                = {Proceedings of the 49th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies: short papers-Volume 2},
        Year                     = {2011},
        Organization             = {Association for Computational Linguistics},
        Pages                    = {42--47}
        }
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fjb11@students.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
